short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Asana boards by changing deadline colors and removing preview images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Task Wizard for Asana

Enhance your Asana experience with Task Wizard! This Chrome extension improves productivity on Asana boards by automatically updating task deadline colors and removing distracting preview images.

Features:
• Color-coded Deadlines: Instantly see task priority with color changes based on due date status (future, soon, past).
• Image Remover: Keep your workspace clutter-free by removing preview images from task cards.

Perfect for Asana users looking to streamline their workflow and stay organized. Easily toggle features on/off to customize your experience!
